text: (nabiye!) kavurun melova jivitayen mat vi tamange dharmaya puhu sellamak vasayenda, (vihiluvak vasayenda) æra gattoda, ovunva (ovunge gamanehi) athæra damanu. ehet ‘sæma atmayakma tama (napuru) kriyavange hetuven (viniscaya dinadi) vipatata ætulu vanu æta’ yana satyaya oba (ovunta) matak kara denu. (edina) eyata mædihat vi kata karannan ho udav karannan ho allah misa, kisivekut ætte næta. (papatarayan tamange danduvamata) vandi vasayen (sarilana) siyallama laba dunnada, eya bara ganu labanne næta. ovun tamange (napuru) kriyavanhi hetuvenma vipatata ætulu vuha. ovunge pratiksepaye hetuven itamat vedana genadena danduvamat samaga (bimata) uturana panayakda labannaha
